title: Xbox Buys Activision Blizzard - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.18.22
description:
HOLY CRAP!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
PSILY’s re-review of Horizon Zero Dawn is live!
R6 Extraction Let’s Play JUST went live!
Help us out by filling out the RT Podcast survey about all the Kinda Funny Podcasts -- it only says "Kinda Funny Podcast" but they mean all of our podcasts. It takes just a few minutes and helps our network understand what you like about us! kindafunny.com/podcastsurvey
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes)
Black Jack
Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:03:49 - Xbox Buys Activision Blizzard
https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2022/01/18/welcoming-activision-blizzard-to-microsoft-gaming/
00:26:15 - I am wondering the effects this will have to a more casual gamer. - Best Friends Q:Andy
00:28:35 - Is Microsoft’s Acquisition of Activision-Blizzard concerning from a monopoly standpoint? - Best Friends Q:Jordan Deeb
00:46:00 -  Ad
01:03:00 - E3 Online Event is Dead?.
01:07:08 - Nobody Saves the World Review Round-Up
Metacritic @ 8:44 am: 77 11 Xbox / 81 17 PC
01:14:40 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
